text: As a general rule we did not ask for oral evidence, though we found it an advantage in certain instances. Appendix 1 gives a list of the bodies and persons consulted. The Department of Health for Scotland, the Home Office and the Ministry of Health submitted evidence to us; officers of these Departments attended our meetings and have given us valuable assistance.
